summary: Political intrigue and psychological drama run parallel. The queen is in seclusion, veiling her face for the ten years since her husband's assassination, longing to join him in death. ... See full summary »
cast: Edwige Feuillère|Silvia Monfort|Jean Marais|Jean Debucourt|Jacques Varennes|Ahmed Abdallah|Gilles Quéant|Maurice Nasil|W. Edward Stirling|Yvonne de Bray|Gisèle Brucker|Capucine|Nora Costes|André Darnay|Martine de Breteuil|Marguerite de Morlaye|Edouard Dermithe|Guy Favières|Edith Lansac|Jacqueline Marbaux|Yves Massard|Claude Serre|Victor Tabournot|Marion Tourès|Roger Vincent|Shannon Watson II|Gilles Watteaux
title: El águila de dos cabezas
